name: reset-request-url
description: Make sure request with right url.Especially the Params can't use null、‘’ and undefined.

scripts.build: npm run tsc:build && npm run babel:mjs &&  npm run babel:cjs && npm run commonjs
scripts.tsc:build: rm -fr dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.es.json
scripts.build:publish: npm run build && npm run publish
